title: LF duo partner
body:
LF duo partner that is Gold to Silver 3.. I am currently Gold V at the moment. I main ADC or mid lane.. i can go other lanes if needed.


Basically wanting someone that is decent and plays there role and does not verbally abuse.

Add me in game (Martoner) or post here! Cheers :)

replies.body: can i duo with u ? i'm in silver 4 atm  i almost win lane but i cant carry team
S4 supp main add me if you're interested
would you play with a silver 4 ? haha
